markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Terrain Master](/Feats.aspx?ID=4885) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 161 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Horizon Walker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=63) (Level 10)

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16); [Favored Terrain](/Feats.aspx?ID=4866)

</column>

---

You are able to adapt to your surroundings in any natural terrain. You can spend 1 hour practicing in your current terrain in order to make it your favored terrain, replacing your current favored terrain temporarily. If you spend a full day out of the new favored terrain, your favored terrain reverts back to your original choice when you took the Favored Terrain feat.
name: Terrain Master
